formElement.label: LabManager Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for LabManager. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: LabManager Organization:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Organization in LabManager. This must reference an existing Organization in Lab Manager.

formElement.label: LabManager Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer). This must reference an existing Workspace in Lab Manager(default is Main).

formElement.label: Configuration Id:
formElement.documentation: Id of the configuration whose owner will be changed.

formElement.label: New Owner Name:
formElement.documentation: Id of the new configuration owner.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
